Description.Name: Liam Foster
Description.Details: Liam Foster, known by the callsign "Tesla", is a 33-year-old prodigious MechWarrior, celebrated for his unparalleled engineering brilliance. From an early age, Liam's fascination with mechanics and technology was evident, earning him the nickname "Tesla" after the famed inventor. Raised in a family of skilled engineers, he honed his skills alongside his kin, becoming a master of mech modifications and innovations. Tesla fights with technical prowess on the battlefield, optimizing his BattleMech's performance and tailoring custom upgrades. His profound understanding of systems grants him a distinct advantage, making him an invaluable asset to his mercenary unit.
